name: Captcha Capture
description:
If the embed isn't displaying properly , click on fullscreen

To create a Painting feed the purple ore to the sheep and take the wool to the printer 

Story:

It has been hundreds of years since the world ended. Only echoes of the memories of the old world are left, and the last humans survive day to day by scavenging what they can. avoiding the mindless killbots running around.

One day you discover an image generation AI that somehow survived the end of the world. It calls itself PRINTR and offers to take you as its apprentice and teach you how to make art.

Help PRINTR bring the lost art of painting back to a broken world.

Oh, and being ambushed by rogue killbots? The artist will not be distracted by such things. That's a problem for the apprentice to deal with.

Gameplay: Left Mouse Shoot Enter Skip Dialog WASD Move Space Pickup/Throw Item Shift Dash
BackspaceShow full dialogue Line

A top down shooter with resource management elements. Keep PRINTR safe from the killbots while supplying it with materials to make its paintings.

Credits:
